This is a testharness.js-based test.
[FAIL] Buttons in the popover should be rendered and should not close the popover when clicked.
  promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "TypeError: Cannot set properties of null (setting 'onclick')"
[FAIL] Non-interactive content in the popover should not close the popover when clicked.
  assert_false: expected false got true
Harness: the test ran to completion.
